description: React functional component 'NotesList' that displays a list of notes, highlighting the active note, and provides options to select or delete notes. It imports React and a CSS stylesheet, and renders note items with click and keyboard interactions.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, activeId, onSelect, onDelete })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a list of note items with selection and deletion capabilities.
